# React + Vite + TypeScript Project

This workspace contains a React application built with Vite and TypeScript.

## Project Setup Complete

- [x] Project scaffolded with Vite
- [x] React with TypeScript configured
- [x] Dependencies installed
- [x] Development task available

## Development

To start the development server:

```bash
npm run dev
```

The application will be available at http://localhost:5173/

## Build

To build for production:

```bash
npm run build
```

## Technologies

- React 18
- TypeScript
- Vite 7
- ESLint
